If enabled, the room is visible and book: If enabled, the room is visible and bookable by everyone (including non-logged-in visitors).
If disabled, only users with access to t: If disabled, only users with access to the owner or direct access to the room can see and book it.
If free contribution is selected, the fo: If free contribution is selected, the following settings are used to calculate a suggested price
E.g.: reservations after 5pm always get: E.g.: reservations after 5pm always get the "short" rate
E.g.: reservations ending before 12pm al: E.g.: reservations ending before 12pm always get the "short" rate
E.g.: if a reservation ends the next day: E.g.: if a reservation ends the next day before 3am, the following day is not counted
Required if short reservation price is s: Required if short reservation price is set
Allows admins to grant special discounts: Allows admins to grant special discounts on a case-by-case basis
Display an optional field in the booking: Display an optional field in the booking form to add a donation
